welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lorica, Colombia! Known for its vibrant culture and beautiful landscapes, we are excited to have you here. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tolu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tolu Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Jeronimo Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at S. Jeronimo Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
